creator: aolserver@aol.net
text:
libapr.so refers to hstrerror (from /usr/lib/libresolv.so), but doesn't link to
the libresolv.so. This causes problems when loading libapr.so from AOLserver.

creator: aolserver@aol.net
text: Problem manifested under gcc 2.96 on Linux and Solaris, and Forte Tools 6 on Solaris

creator: joe@manyfish.co.uk
text: This should be fixed in APR HEAD, thanks for the report.
